sentences.sentence: By hanging panels of sound absorbing felt on the walls, Sabine reduced the echo enough to make the hall usable.
sentences.translation: 通过在墙上悬挂吸音板，Sabine 减少了足够的回声，使大厅可用。

sentences.sentence: Sabine no longer does any news reporting for NBC.
The rape of the Sabine women is a case in point.
sentences.translation: 罗马人抢掠萨宾族妇女就是最好的例子。
